Description: Foot sherd of Attic black-glazed pottery bowl; ring foot with grooved resting surface and nipple at centre of underside; wholly glazed save for groove of stand-ring; incised inscription on underside.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIV, no. 558)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 673, no. 317)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1801)
